com.topcoder.util.format
Interface ObjectFormatMethod

All Known Subinterfaces:
DateFormatMethod
public interface ObjectFormatMethod

An interface that provides a method for formatting Objects as strings. Usually, an ObjectFormatMethod will handle the formatting for a single type, or a single type and its subtypes; ObjectFormatters are used to format many different Object types.

Version:
1.0
Author:
KurtSteinkraus

Method Summary
 java.lang.String format(java.lang.Object obj)
          Converts the given Object into an appropriate string representation.
 

Method Detail

format

public java.lang.String format(java.lang.Object obj)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Converts the given Object into an appropriate string representation.

Parameters:
obj - a Object value
Returns:
a formatted string representing obj
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this format method is not capable of formatting the supplied Object
